subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Prince Fielder’s two home runs led Detroit in its home opener, but the Yankees’ Eduardo Nunez, starting in Derek Jeter’s absence, had to leave the game after being hit by a pitch.
snippet: Prince Fielder’s two home runs led Detroit in its home opener, but the Yankees’ Eduardo Nunez, starting in Derek Jeter’s absence, had to leave the game after being hit by a pitch.
